mapper.select:
SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_card_no, stage_no, stage_name, pay_term_id, pay_plan_date, pay_plan_percent, pay_plan_money, pay_money, unpay_money, ven_id, ven_no, note, bill_money, unbill_money FROM ass_pay_stage_house
AND group_id = #{group_id} AND hos_id = #{hos_id} AND copy_code = #{copy_code} AND ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_card_no, stage_no, stage_name, pay_term_id, pay_plan_date, pay_plan_percent, pay_plan_money, pay_money, unpay_money, ven_id, ven_no, note, bill_money, unbill_money FROM ass_pay_stage_house WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
